a.xlink:title: Header file for light scene example (unfinished)
Object for diffuse (random) scattering. Subclass of material.
A glass object that refracts/reflects using Snell's Law.
Reflective surface, with additional fuzzy scattering.
Class for our Bounding Volume Hierarchy. Acts as both tree and root.
Sphere object moving, for motion blur.
Rectangular plane object to be rendered.
The ray object for our tracing algorithm.
Custom 3D vector class for points, colours and rays.
All the random functionality I am too lazy to organize elsewhere.
Bounding box object, used to compute BVH tree.
Abstract object that can be hit by a ray.
